sub_title: Wellness Business Consultant, Holistic massage therapist, Beautician | Each treatment is personalized! I guide clients at all levels of relaxing and relieving pain. | üíé Passionate about anti-pain treatments!
summary:
üåê I advise wellness companies on how to increase profits and improve the guest experience. üåê
Let me teach you how to look at your service through the eyes of a guest and tailor the guest journey, list of treatments, and business accordingly. üìà
Wellness has recently developed as a help center for individuals who suffer from minor stress-related health problems or want to indulge in pampering. It's not just a luxury. In this sense, the whole organization needs to be set up. ‚è≤  A set of similar treatments, as has been seen many times before, is no longer enough. 
BUT: The whole guest experience needs to be made meaningful.

LET'S TAKE TOGETHER ALL THE NECESSARY STEPS FOR SUCCESS:
üëç define your typical guest and his needs
üëç define your resources
üëç optimize the list of treatments
üëç train staff for better performance and understanding of treatments
üëç optimize inventories and purchases
üëç create strategies for marketing and advertisement
üëç build a brand and establish sustainable growth

WHAT CAN I TEACH YOUR STAFF?
Guest journey | Reception | Sales techniques | Classical massage | Sports massage |Aromatherapy | Deep tissue massage | Reflexotherapy | Indian head massage | Face lifting massage | Body sculpting techniques | Various face treatments | Anti-cellulite treatments | Hot stones | Thai poultices | Scrubs and wraps | and more‚Ä¶

WHY AM I YOUR BEST CHOICE TO DO WELLNESS SUCCESSFULLY?
I have run my company for twenty years and know almost all aspects of the business. International experience from 5-star and 6-star environments puts me in a very lucky position to be faced with managing wellness of the highest rank. Now I know what really matters and how to attract new customers, improve their experience and make a business outstanding.

üéØ  send me an invitation to connect or contact me for an informative (online) meeting.
